programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Hard Luck
programme.desc: A family comes to the funeral of their beloved grandfather. After the burial it turns out that the numbers grandfather always bet at the lottery just won big, but the winning ticket was buried with him. The race for the buried ticket begins.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncle’s boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 3: Find Her
programme.desc: As Shelly attempts to maintain her routine, she is haunted by her past. When Lynch's true identity is discovered, a UK cold case officer re-opens a case which she is convinced involves Lynch and his then girlfriend.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 4: Deirdre
programme.desc: Shelly's attempts to bond with Derek are not a success. Meanwhile, following the lead of the hotel sex-worker, Jason and Fiona discover victims of a brutal trafficking organisation.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Woman On The Train
programme.desc: The reveal of the mysterious, new Chief Inspector receives a lukewarm welcome while the unexpected death of the Commissioner sends shockwaves through the Kiel police. With each new lead, it is clear that the situation may be more complex than it seems.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 5: Let It Go

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Woman On The Train
programme.desc: The reveal of the mysterious, new Chief Inspector receives a lukewarm welcome while the unexpected death of the Commissioner sends shockwaves through the Kiel police. With each new lead, it is clear that the situation may be more complex than it seems.

programme.title: The Broken Glass Theory
programme.desc: Insurance claims investigator Claudio finds himself in a never-ending nightmare in a small town. For what seemed like a simple job, Claudio's task now involves racing against the clock to discover the identity of the worst serial arsonist he has yet seen.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Hippocrates
programme.desc: Benjamin dreams of being a great doctor, but his internship at his father’s ward doesn’t turn out the way he hoped. His experience as a junior doctor, with its overwhelming responsibility and stiff competition, forces him to confront his limits and fears.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 5: Let It Go
programme.desc: Despite political pressure to close the case and managing to avoid fingerprint detection, Shelly is put in a precarious position when descriptions from new witnesses threaten to implicate her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 6: Silent Mouth
programme.desc: The pressure builds on all fronts as Jason tries to close the case. Will Shelly be able survive as the pressure builds? The one option closed to her is to flee - she would never leave her children.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Beach Chair Murder
programme.desc: The body of Marion Caspary is found in a beach chair by the sea. Near the scene of the crime, Commissioner Sievers comes across Piet Pinter, an elderly confused gentleman. What connection does he have to the murder?

programme.title: A Little Lesson In Love
programme.desc: Taking shelter from a storm inside a cafe, Julie finds a stack of math papers left behind and a troubling love letter. It seems that a teenager had written it for her teacher, and it is up to Julie to prevent the student from doing anything stupid.

programme.title: Mercenary
programme.desc: Soane, a young Caledonian, leaves home to try his luck in France as a rugby player. Left on his own in a foreign land, Soane’s odyssey will take him on the path to becoming a man in a world where there is a price to be paid for success.

programme.title: Future Is A Lonely Place
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for his family’s death, Frank stages a crime and turns himself in to infiltrate a prison drug ring. Frank aims to get close to the man responsible for their death, and forms a dangerous bond with a guard along the way.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The World
programme.desc: In a poor Brazilian neighbourhood, its many inhabitants struggle to make ends meet. Everyone yearns for a happier future where life isn’t only about unforgiving survival – petty crime, big crime, anything that pays becomes a pathway of hope.

programme.title: Good Luck Sam
programme.desc: Sam and Stéphane, childhood friends and ski equipment designers, embark on a wild quest to save their struggling business. They hatch a plan to enter Sam into the Winter Olympics, and have him compete under his father’s home country of Algeria.

programme.title: My Daughter On The Run
programme.desc: When the police deem her daughter’s runaway case as not a priority, Jeanne has to look for her daughter by herself. Jeanne begins a journey into hell, as she learns that her daughter has become a stranger to her.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.
